name: src/application.js
Application
description: Represents an application providing functionalities specific to console requests.

name: debug
description: Value indicating whether the application runs in debug mode.

name: env
description: The application environment.

name: loadConfig
description: Loads the application configuration from the file system.

return.description: An array of objects containing the settings of one or several reverse proxy instances.

name: log
description: Prints the specified message, with a timestamp and a new line, to the standard output.

params.name: message
params.description: The message to be logged. If it's a function, the message is the result of the function call.

name: run
description: Runs the application.

return.description: Completes when the reverse proxy has been started.

name: setUser
description: Sets the user identity of the application process.

name: startServers
description: Starts the specified reverse proxy instances.

params.name: servers
params.description: The list of servers to start.

return.description: Completes when all servers have been started.

name: _parseConfig
description: Parses the specified configuration.

params.name: data
params.description: A string specifying the application configuration.

return.description: An array of objects corresponding to the parsed configuration.

name: src/server.js
Server
description: Acts as an intermediary for requests from clients seeking resources from other servers.

name: DEFAULT_ADDRESS
description: The default address that the server is listening on.

name: DEFAULT_PORT
description: The default port that the server is listening on.

name: constructor
description: Initializes a new instance of the class.

params.name: options
params.description: An object specifying the server settings.

name: _httpService
description: The underlying HTTP(S) service listening for requests.

name: _onClose
description: The handler of "close" events.

name: _onError
description: The handler of "error" events.

name: _onListen
description: The handler of "listen" events.

name: _onRequest
description: The handler of "request" events.

name: _options
description: The server settings.

name: _proxyService
description: The underlying proxy service providing custom application logic.

name: address
description: The address that the server is listening on.

name: listening
description: Value indicating whether the server is currently listening.

name: onClose
description: The stream of "close" events.

name: onError
description: The stream of "error" events.

name: onListen
description: The stream of "listen" events.

name: onRequest
description: The stream of "request" events.

name: port
description: The port that the server is listening on.

name: close
description: Stops the server from accepting new connections. It does nothing if the server is already closed.

return.description: Completes when the server is finally closed.

name: listen
description: Begin accepting connections. It does nothing if the server is already started.

params.name: port
params.description: The port that the server should run on.

params.name: address
params.description: The address that the server should run on.

return.description: The port that the server is running on.

name: _getHostName
description: Gets the host name contained in the headers of the specified request.

params.name: req
params.description: The request sent by the client.

return.description: The host name provided by the specified request, or `*` if the host name could not be determined.

name: _onHTTPRequest
description: Handles an HTTP request to a target.

params.name: req
params.description: The request sent by the client.

params.name: res
params.description: The response sent by the server.

name: _onRequestError
description: Handles the error emitted if a request to a target fails.

params.name: req
params.description: The request sent by the client.

params.name: res
params.description: The response sent by the server.

name: _onWSRequest
description: Handles a WebSocket request to a target.

params.name: req
params.description: The request sent by the client.

params.name: socket
params.description: The network socket between the server and client.

params.name: head
params.description: The first packet of the upgraded stream.

name: _sendStatus
description: Sends an HTTP status code and terminates the specified server response.

params.name: statusCode
params.description: The HTTP status code to send.

name: test/application_test.js
describe0
description: Application

name: describe1
description: #debug

name: it2
description: should be `false` in production environment

name: it3
description: should be `true` in development environment

name: describe4
description: #env

name: it5
description: should be "production" if the NODE_ENV environment variable is not set

name: it6
description: should equal the value of `NODE_ENV` environment variable when it is set

name: describe7
description: #loadConfig()

name: it8
description: should return an array of objects corresponding to the ones specified on the command line arguments

name: it9
description: should return an array of objects corresponding to the ones specified in the JSON configuration

name: it10
description: should return an array of objects corresponding to the ones specified in the YAML configuration

name: describe11
description: #_parseConfig()

name: it12
description: should throw an error if the parsed JSON configuration has no `routes` and no `target` properties

name: it13
description: should completes with an array if the parsed JSON configuration is valid

name: it14
description: should throw an error if the parsed YAML configuration has no `routes` and no `target` properties

name: it15
description: should completes with an array if the parsed YAML configuration is valid

name: test/server_test.js
describe16
description: Server

name: describe17
description: #address

name: it18
description: should have an "any IPv4" address as the default address

name: it19
description: should have the same host as the specified one

name: describe20
description: #listening

name: it21
description: should return whether the server is listening

name: describe22
description: #onClose

name: it23
description: should return an Observable instead of the underlying Subject

name: describe24
description: #onError

name: it25
description: should return an Observable instead of the underlying Subject

name: describe26
description: #onListen

name: it27
description: should return an Observable instead of the underlying Subject

name: describe28
description: #onRequest

name: it29
description: should return an Observable instead of the underlying Subject

name: describe30
description: #port

name: it31
description: should have 3000 as the default port

name: it32
description: should have the same port as the specified one

name: describe33
description: #_getHostName()

name: it34
description: it should return "*" if there is no "Host" header in the request

name: it35
description: it should return the "Host" header found in the request, without the port number
